page.title: 02THE MAYOR
page.content: His Worshipful The Mayor of Stratford- upon-Avon is Victor Joseph Henry Sandel.The Mayor is elected by Stratford Town Council.The Mayor is elected annually and usually does not serve for more than one year.There is no salary paid to the Mayor.He receives an allowance to help with travelling and other expenses.The Mayor is proud to be first citizen of Stratford-upon-Avon.He enjoys the kindness and understanding of people; and he feels proud to represent the town of Stratford-upon-Avon.His favourite part of the job is meeting people.The Mayor has not got a job apart from being the Mayor but he has been doing road safety for 23 years.He has had other jobs but now he has retired.The Mayor likes to garden and play bowls in his spare time.
